title: Uncle Gerry's Family Fun Zone : r/nosleep - Reddit
body: Probably fifteen feet high, and above it was the sign: Uncle Gerry's Family Fun Zone, with this picture of a cartoon farmer with a piece of straw hanging from his mouth. And the sign had been vandalized. Someone had spray-painted X's over the farmer's eyes, and nearly every letter had been scribbled out.
readable_content:
- Reddit Recap (2023-12-08):
  - Red_Grin (8 years ago)
    Uncle Gerry’s Family Fun Zone
    ...
    Excerpt of Caroline Interview
    So how did you and Will meet?
    We went to the same schools growing up, but we weren’t friends or anything like that...
    ...
    Did they know what you were talking about?
    Oh, yeah. Everyone had heard of Uncle Gerry’s...
    ...I haven’t thought about this in years...Will came to me. H
